snippet: History presents a 12-hour mini-series, “Mankind: The Story of All of Us,” which uses figures from the academic and popular-culture fields to trace human history, with an emphasis on warfare.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews History Channel television documentary mini-series Mankind: The Story of All of Us.
lead_paragraph: History presents a 12-hour mini-series, “Mankind: The Story of All of Us,” which uses figures from the academic and popular-culture fields to trace human history, with an emphasis on warfare.

headline.seo: ‘Mankind: The Story of All of Us,’ on History
headline.main: Yes, a Big Topic. Want to Fight About It?
